org.biopax.validator.api

Class AbstractRule<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biopax.validator.api.AbstractRule<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - a type the rule can validate, though it also depends on Rule.canCheck(Object) method implementation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rule<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:

extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • error

        public void error(Validation validation,
                  Object object,
                  String code,
                  boolean setFixed,
                  Object... args)
        Saves the error or warning that occurred or was fixed. Call this method from a validation rule implementation every time after a problem is found and/or fixed. Implementation of the interface method.
        Specified by:
        error in interface Rule<T>
        Parameters:
        validation - the object where the model, validation settings and errors are stored
        object - that is invalid or caused the error
        code - error code, e.g., 'illegal.value'
        args - extra parameters for the error message template
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when validation is null
